actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require the United States Army Corps of Engineers to construct streambank protection for Clarksville, Tennessee.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct streambank protection for the city of Clarksville, Tennessee. Provides the total cost, and the non-Federal share of the cost, of such construction.

titles.title: A bill to require the United States Army Corps of Engineers to construct streambank protection for Clarksville, Tennessee.
